bibl.title: "Their Fifteen Enemies": The Text of Rev. xi. 12 in P 47 and 1611.
bibl.note: "In any case, whether we suppose that one or both of the scribes made the error, it is clear that this surprising reading in two important manuscripts is due to nothing more than scribal carelessness."
bibl.seg: Royse James R., "Their Fifteen Enemies": The Text of Rev. xi. 12 in P 47 and 1611.

"In any case, whether we suppose that one or both of the scribes made the error, it is clear that this surprising reading in two important manuscripts is due to nothing more than scribal carelessness."
